statements: DELETE FROM big_data_platforms WHERE hadoop_support = TRUE AND spark_version = '2.4.7';
DELETE FROM SparkIntegration WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM HadoopIntegration WHERE name = 'Alice' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM SparkIntegration WHERE city = 'New York' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
DELETE FROM table1 WHERE age > 30 AND name = 'John';
DELETE FROM table3 WHERE quantity < 5 OR price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM spark_analytics WHERE worker_id = 500 AND record_id = 200;
DELETE FROM HadoopTables WHERE db_id = 1 AND table_name = 'users';
DELETE FROM SparkTables WHERE table_schema = 'public' AND db_id = (SELECT db_id FROM SQLDatabases WHERE db_name = 'production');
